name: Manuel Vega
headline: FullStack Mid-level Web Dev
about:
4+ years of work experience and 5+ years in the code world.
My specialty is front-end development with JavaScript technologies like React.

work-experience.title: Full-stack Developer
work-experience.description:
Develop and maintain features of a web dashboard written on the back in PHP and Codeigniter, and on the front with JS and JQuery.
Making from scratch new dashboards, APIRest and Telegram Bots. All these are written in JS with Node and React.

work-experience.title: Desarrollador Frontend
work-experience.description:
Design, develop and deploy landing pages, inventory systems, and online store websites from scratch.
Re-design UI & UX for old websites.

work-experience.title: Web Developer
work-experience.description: Develop and do maintenance websites for different companies in LA.

work-experience.title: Font-End Web Developer
work-experience.description:
Create, and deploy online stores, car dealers, and websites from scratch and designs in Figma.
Optimize SEO and performance websites.
Was developed a custom CSS library for the styles, based on Material Design.
Most clients were from USA and Canada, therefore the main language for the UI was American English.

education.degree: Técnico laboral en Electrónica y Telecomunicaciones
